biography.firstAppearance: as Dick Grayson and Robin) Detective Comics #38, (as Nightwing) Tales of the Teen Titans #44, (as Batman) Batman #512

work.occupation: Vigilante and detective, former police officer, former Circus Acrobat
work.base: Wayne Tower, Gotham City; formerly the Batcave; formerly Bludhaven; formerly New York City

connections.groupAffiliation: Batman Family and the JLA; formerly the Teen Titans, the New Titans, the Titans and the Outsiders
connections.relatives: John Grayson (father, deceased), Mary Grayson (mother, deceased), Bruce Wayne / Batman (adoptive father), Damian Wayne / Robin (foster brother), Jason Todd / Red Hood (adoptive brother), Tim Drake / Red Robin (adoptive brother), Cassandra Cain / Batgirl IV (adoptive sister)
